projectGridLines.title: Wi-Fi drivers for the Orinoco WIFI radio for QNX 8.0
projectGridLines.description:
New chipsets for the WIFI are highly in demand for various embedded boards. These new chipsets are eventually deployed in a variety of applications like Automotive, medical etc. 

?Traits expectation: Understanding of Microprocessor or micro controllers.

Expected learning: Board Support Package, Device drivers, RTOS, low level debugging.

projectGridLines.title: OpenCV porting to QNX
projectGridLines.description:
OpenCV is a computer vision library which does not work on QNX RTOS currently. This library has extensive uses in various industry where computer vision kind of algorithms are used.

Skill sets: Excellent knowledge of C & C++. RTOS

Traits expectation: ELF Binaries, Libraries, and the interdependencies

Expected learning: QNX, POSIX, RTOS, QNX Application building.
